name: REPTILOIDS 2
description:
‘Reptiloids 2’ is a super action game about a reptiloids’ and revenge!
  • The main character Sharon, she lose a her boyfriend because Reptiloids killed him in the first part of this story! And now she want to revenge!

  • The main reptiloids’ boss escaped, you must find and kill him! Neutralize all the reptiloids and save humanity race.

  • To progress successfully through the game, you can use different tactics in close fighting, block punches, dodge, run away, choose your goals, and do other things.

  • In ‘Reptiloids 2’, not only your fists and legs become your weapons but a variety of entourage items, such as hammers, bits, axes, and a lot of other subway items.

  • Beware of treacherous reptiloids: they are incredibly powerful with a huge amount of health and strong defense.And now they more stronger, because they have a foil caps!

  • If you play successfully, the main character will receive bonuses and additional weapons. But if you play badly, you can lose weapons, health, and any hope of salvation!
